entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023
